website_summaries.verdict: Cuts through brake dust quickly  in nooks and crannies.
pros: Foaming non-acidic cleaner makes tires look brand new
Cuts through old brake dust and reveals shine
cons: May need a strong hose or stream of water pressure to remove product fully
Won't work on polished aluminum, forged alloy, or plastics

customer_reviews.title: Hard tested... mother approved...lol
customer_reviews.text: Wow. First time using this. I tested it hard. Didn't even rinse the wheel off first. And i used a garden hose with a pressure tip. No doubt... with a proper spray and dry before using. And then using a pressure washer... this stuff would make the dirtiest wheels look brand new. 1 bottle was just enough to wash all four wheels and tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: With a bit of scrubbing, amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I could not get my rims cleaned no matter how much I scrubbed. Ordered this and once I started spraying, I could SEE the grime just melt away. I did use a tire brush to scrub and they are shiny as ever! I had to go back with a rag for a few stubborn spots but I couldn’t be happier with the results. The directions say to spray, leave for 30seconds, spray. That didn’t not work for me but for tires in less dire shape than mine, maybe!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.HerdOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner, Stingy Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This works OK at cleaning wheels. Make sure that you have a wheel brush handy when you use it. It's not a magical foam that will lift all of the brake dust away, but it will loosen it enough to be easily removed with a brush. My biggest complaint is that it sprays in a very narrow stream and does not produce much foam with each pump, even on the "wide" setting. I only have 17" wheels on my car and it is a chore to make sure I get the foam all over the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good.
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of small things to complain about but in the end this stuff works better than any other alternative is have tried. The bad: the ergonomics of the sprayer aren't great and my hands tire quickly with this. It smells like heavy chemicals. I have to use a ton and only get to clean about 8 wheels with an entire bottle. The good: It works very well. It pulls the nasty stuff right out of the tires like no other product I've used. It's cheap and it's very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: eevans004

customer_reviews.title: Always agitate with a wheel brush
customer_reviews.text: Just spraying this alone removes a lot of the brake dust and dirt on your wheels. To make the most out of it, make sure to agitate your rims with a wheel brush to reach the insides (a good one is no more than $20). ALWAYS wear gloves and protective glasses! Your fingertips will peel if you don't wear gloves because the foam will slowly leak out of the tip while you're spraying. Your safety glasses will prevent the foam from getting into your eyes when you're using the wheel brush.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works, but the pump is tiresome
customer_reviews.text: I like this wheel and tire cleaner in that it works if you can get enough of it onto your tire. It also smells really nice. However, it took quite a bit of pumping to get enough on and the spray bottle is difficult to use that much (it's not that it's hard, it just builds up as you use it). Not sure I'll get again.
customer_reviews.author: ALLFLUKSD

customer_reviews.title: Typical Mothers
customer_reviews.text: I used this wheel cleaner this past weekend on my stock painted alloy wheels. They had become dirty with brake dust and road grime and the drive through car wash was no help. With the nice weather I treated the car to a personal car wash. I followed the instructions and the wheels are clean. The only problem is you need to use a lot of the foaming spray to cover the wheels various surfaces. On my car one 24 oz. bottle should cclean the four wheels twice. Since this is the first wheel cleaner of this type I'm not sure if that expensive. However, I'm very please with the easy no touch results.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it might not work well or that it might ruin my wheels. I just got a 2016 Subaru Legacy and I didn't want to mess it up like some reviewers. I took the chance and it turned out great. Spread about a squirt on each giant area of dirt/break dust and went at it with a scrub. You can instantly see the grime just run off the wheel. Hosed it down and it was like brand new. Really like the product upon initial review. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tech Student Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: White glove clean! Mothers know best!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to clean the grime and crud from my wheels. I couldn't be happier. I could have wiped my wheels with a white glove after the first spray/scrub and would have been clean. The only thing, and this is being a little picky, the spray nozzle was not the best. It shot the cleaner out randomly and got all over my hands. It made it a little difficult to hold my drill/brush. Outside of that, exactly what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Stout

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I was looking for a product that would remove the break dust off of my tires and also shine my wheels up. This gets the job done and I will 100% purchase it again. I scrubbed my tires and wheels with the Mother's designated brushes, but honestly, I didn't even have to. Should you buy this, you certainly wont regret it one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because it is a whole wheel cleaner that ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it is a whole wheel cleaner that works moderately well. You will still need to scrub tougher spots. Will not work well on tough, baked-on brake dust.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used on my daughter's 2006 Honda CRV with old mud stains on the tires and caked-on brake dust on the wheels. (I had tried cleaning with rags and a toothbrush, but nothing worked.) As soon as this stuff hits the surface, the dirt melted off! I rinsed with a garden hose at full force. That took off 99% of the dirt. I gave it a second pass for spots I missed. It looks terrific. The pump is a little hard to squeeze and the foam is a little hard to direct, but otherwise I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Apadula

customer_reviews.title: Black Rims Shine!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wheel and tire cleaner. Easy to use spray on, wait a few minutes and hose off. I have black rims and very hard water which creates spots. Using Mother’s has eliminated the problem, my black rims look amazing. Best price I’ve found is here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner, Bad sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it works on the wheels, but, the sprayer lacks the ability to get the product on the wheel. Puts out a thick foam and by the time you get all four wheels covered your hand will feel abused. Following the directions will result in a good result ONLY if you have the ability to get the product evenly over the wheels which is almost impossible
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Still have to use a lot of elbow grease to clean the wheels on my 08’ Z06 after spraying on the product. Just use soap and water and save your money. Does not simply “spray on and rinse off brake dust”
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: God product
customer_reviews.text: I've used several tire cleaners. This ones good. Not a miracle product but does a good job for the $. Makes cleaning easier. Sprays off relatively easy. I like it. Not a miracle product but as good as most others I've used.
customer_reviews.author: matt M

customer_reviews.title: cuts through just about anything
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is great. It cuts through brake dust that soap wont even touch. however you cant really just leave it on for 30 seconds and spray it off. if the cleaner sits on one area too long, it begins to dry, and leaves behind residue. I find its best to use a couple sprays of this on a sponge with a liberal dose of water. Rinse quickly, do multiple scrub downs if needed. You only need a spritz, so its not like you have to worry about wasting product. Use it right and you'll love it. a bottle lasts me at least 6 months of almost weekly washing.
customer_reviews.author: Rynn Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Gets the brown off
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that works excellent at cleaning away the tire blooming, when the tire turns brown. Because it's a wheel AND TIRE cleaner, big emphasis on the Tire part. It exceeded my expectations. It yielded great results, after the first go around. No need for a second scrubbing because it got the brown off on the first scrubbing. I am impressed, this is now my top tire product in my detailing arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: krystull

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all types of wheel finishes, and the tires, too.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Mother's tire brush to help with the tire grime and the wheel rim to make sure everything is going to disappear when I rinse. I use a soft wand to make sure all of the nooks and crannies in my wheels are treated. I have four vehicles to maintain, and appreciate a better price to get what I have found to work best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions to the letter. Tried it on wheels with brake dust on them. After spraying on the wheels, it foams up as promised but after washing off with a strong powerful water spray (as per the instructions), there is no difference to the brake dust that is still stuck to the wheels. Had to eventually wash off the brake dust using a proper sponge with soapy sudsy water. Felt like I was simply spraying foam onto the wheels with ZERO effect on getting the brake dust and grime to come off. Total waste of money. Recommend to avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: MC7571X

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner, not great. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cleaner, but sometimes you need to use a brush to get rims completely clean. I haven't had much luck with other brands, pretty much all of them doing well on surface dirt and grime, none of them eliminating the harder stuff with just spray on and rinse off. Good price, that's why I keep using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley24

customer_reviews.title: Works better than sonax - cheaper and smells better too
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wheel + tire cleaner on the market. Sonax has never worked well for me and smells like poo. Meguiars wheel brightener works well, but also smells like crap and isn't for tires. This Mothers stuff, with a little bit of agitation cleans my tires and rims extremely well, and smells just fine to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Wheel and Tire Cleaner gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Mothers Foaming Wheel and Tire cleaner does an excellent job at an affordable price. After water/foaming spraying car, i spray on Mothers W/T cleaner. Using the proper tools, I scrub tires, wheels and inside of wheels. Rinse off then wash the rest of the car.
customer_reviews.author: All Rise

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: This Foaming and Wheel cleaner was pretty basic. It worked as advertise but there wasn’t anything special about it. It does require a lot of sprays to really build up on the tires so I think it won’t last very long. I did like the clean it had on my rims although. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! Cleans the wheels and tires very well. The only issue is, I go through a lot of it. Thank goodness for the bulk size.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product for my husband , He washes our trucks . He Loves the tire cleaner.. He uses it on the tires and chrome of our trucks .. He's happy
customer_reviews.author: Nora Jones

customer_reviews.title: After 700 pumps it works well.
customer_reviews.text: The formula cleans the wheels and tires fine. The problem is the applicator...it took many 100s of pumps to cover 4 tires and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse Mother's product I have ever used. I sprayed my wheels four times and they still were pretty dirty. I ended up washind by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Hegwood

customer_reviews.title: Yup clean tires.
customer_reviews.text: The product was very good at cleaning the wheels and tires, and in some scenarios I had to use a tire brush for the tougher stains. But it did its job. However you can run out of wheel cleaner in these bottles relatively quickly, because the product is highly compressed into that one bottle. I don't know why but sometimes it would be hard to pull the trigger, where I had cramps. The trigger resists, where at first applying the product was moderately easy for fresh hands. But after a while, it means ow. Oh well, the product did it was supposed to, I applied protectant after, so happy day.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Always works great! Do let it splash in your eye
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I would never leave it on rims more than 60 seconds though, I have heard horror stories about ruining the finish but never for me. Always works great! Do let it splash in your eye, hurts!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The most effective wheel cleaner yet!
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying out various different wheel cleaners, I've found that Mothers wheels and tire cleaner works the best. It doesn't get every single particle of brake dust off your wheels, but it's the most effective to loosen the adhesion between the dust/grime and your wheels. Light scrubbing is still necessary for a spotless shine. Using a power washer to rinse of the cleaner after scrubbing also helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a very good non-acid wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good non-acid wheel cleaner. I use Meguiars Wheel Brightener acid cleaner first, then follow up with Mothers Foaming Wheel & Tire Cleaner. Seems to be a really good one-two punch with minimal scrubbing effort.
customer_reviews.author: slipper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this prodect. I have know dislikes about this item I will reorder in the future and recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: annapolian

customer_reviews.title: Way better wheel cleaners out there
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my wheels on my mustang and it leaves spots all over it no matter how much i rinse i still have to go back and wile my wheels off with a rag
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Get what you paid for. Should have stuck with the Sonax full effect. This stuff wripped the finish off my wheels. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good didn't remove all the dirt. then left a white coating behind I had to take Ajax and a scrub brush to scrub it off. You know what I guess it was not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very good tire and wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product foams so that it sticks to the wheels and doesn't run. Makes it easier to scrub the dirt away.
customer_reviews.author: Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Re-chromed
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on RIMS. It does a fantastic job cleaning rims but not so much the tires. It cleans the tires but I recommend buying tire shine as well. One squirt on the rims makes them SHINE BABY!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as many others
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but the foaming spray nozzle is a PITA to use and puts out too little product. Once on, doesn't clean brake dust and dirt from wheels as well as other products. I miss Meguiar's products.....
customer_reviews.author: GJE

customer_reviews.title: DANGER Will Robinson: This may take the clear coat off your rims if you leave it on too long!
customer_reviews.text: My truck is pretty old ('97), and I have chrome rims.. Got this stuff to give them a good cleaning from all the brake dust that accumulates! Well I sprayed one side, then sprayed the other side (instructions say leave on for 30 seconds) and it could not have been more than a minute before I hosed it off! Well the side where it was on the longest looks completely dull now, almost just like gray spray paint! My guess is that it took some kind of clear coat off the chrome rims! So be careful with this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Guy 2005

customer_reviews.title: wheel in the sky
customer_reviews.text: works ok as a quick cleanup, but brushing/wiping is still required. one bottle lasted through two vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Simple product but very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is very good at removing dust and dirt that collects on the wheel and tire, and isn't abrasive and doesn't leave any marks. Great price too. Spray it on and let sit for a couple minutes - I work it in with the Mothers Contoured Tire Brush, then rinse off and apply your protectant (if you want that wet wheel look, if not, leave as-is)
customer_reviews.author: BWill

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel clearer I have found to date
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel clearer I have found to date. Spray it on, let it sit, hose it off. If the wheels are really bad you may need to do it twice and actually use a scrub brush, but for me only if I go a few months without washing the car (Seattle area in rainy winters).
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Mother's products are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: yes. This is wonderful stuff. Showroom finishes are to be expected and that's what you'll get.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.P.

customer_reviews.title: the best wheel cleaner so far
customer_reviews.text: it works as intended, forget about all those marketing hype. Stick to old school item, your wallet will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Stick with dedicated tire and wheel cleaners- this compromise doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as effective as the separate tire cleaner and wheel cleaner products that they sell. I suppose it cleans the tires fine but it didn't do that good of a job on the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Courage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It is cheaper than other brands I have used in the past, works just as good and it is easier to apply! I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Strong and fast
customer_reviews.text: Great spray to remove brake dust and tire discoloration. Lots of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Yourooteeah

customer_reviews.title: I drive a 1994 Honda Accord EX and this made the alloy wheels shin like new, amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the only wheel cleaner that works. I spray this stuff, wait 30 seconds, then use a rigid wheel brush to scrub, then spray off. I drive a 1994 Honda Accord EX and this made the alloy wheels shin like new, amazing. Bought the sprayer, along with the gallon jug to refill, works like a charm. You'll get about 2 uses per full spray bottle, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bates

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I was bit skeptical when I ordered this product but it exceeded my expectations. I am not saying the wheels look brand new but It removed hell lot of dirt and whatever out there on the wheels of my decade old mazda.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Greatest wheel product ever. Amazing clean/shine w/o damaging expensive rims.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. Read and follow the directions and prepare to be blown away.
customer_reviews.author: NVRambo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money this stuff change the color to brown I will never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Totally worthless
customer_reviews.text: Made my tires look worse than they did before I used it. Tossed it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: I swap between meguiars and mothers whoever’s cheaper
customer_reviews.text: For the price can’t get a better wheel / tire cleaner. Cleans up dirty wheels and tires. Pair with a good brush on tires and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Better Tire Cleaners are Available
customer_reviews.text: The spray dispenser distributes the foam unevenly, so it leaves the tires are spotted and streaked. Better results with Turtle Wax tire cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Harmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The best rim and tire cleaner I've found so far on amazon. This with Mr.clean sponges I kid you not has my wheels and rims looking 20 times better
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my Chrome Rims
customer_reviews.text: It Ruined my chrome rims... Don't buy this kind - had to pay over 500.00 to get my Rims back to the original Chrome finish. was horible
customer_reviews.author: DeniseH

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It actually made the tire worse, and did nothing to clean the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning tires
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I got it to clean my tires, but I didn’t want anything to shine them just get the grime and dust off. This product does exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Edgill

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Depends what the wheels have been through, and on the wheels. Some wheels get 100% clean with just one cleaning. Others require more than one cleaning, some three, some four, etc. I've only used it on OEM wheels that aren't chrome. Mothers formula is good. Tip: Only spray on dry wheels and tires.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Fard M.

customer_reviews.title: Real easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This works really, really well on tires and wheels. I like to use a nylon scrub brush to get the tires and a microfiber for the wheels. They say you shouldn't leave it on the wheels too long or it could possibly discolor them, etc. I haven't run into any issues but I clean and rinse one wheel at a time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coss

customer_reviews.title: wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This works great to get the brake dust off of my cars tire rims
customer_reviews.author: hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Mothers makes great stuff. This takes a while to soak in for the inner rim surfaces, but they do clean up! Outer wheel surfaces clean up easily and look great, without apparent damage so far.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel cleaner on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel cleaner on the market! I use Mother's Foaming Wheel Cleaner with a wheel/tire brush for a brilliant shine on my rims and tires! Easy application and affordable! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Brooklyn Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning is ok, shine(?) is non-existent. I'll not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Shagnat

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works - is all I can say about it. I bought some used rims that had brake dust literally caked onto the wheels. I really didn't think this stuff was going to work, but it did! Note, I did use a brush for physical agitation after spraying the wheels with this. I don't think this is the kind of thing you can spray, let sit and just rinse away the brake dust if it's pretty severe. For light circumstances, I think that would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Nozzle, Required Multiple Applications to Work
customer_reviews.text: Big name product, less than average performance. Leaky nozzle gets all over hand. Had to apply multiple times on a fairly clean clear-coated car wheel. Followed instructions but had to brush. Still have to apply again for third time luck?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only wheel cleaner I buy. Love it. Works on all my vehicle wheels. With a little scrub all brake dust comes off
customer_reviews.author: Michael N Hepler

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really loves the way it leaves that dry look on my tires
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought a lot of wheel cleaners, still buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was defective. While spraying, ...
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was defective. While spraying, it leaked all over my hand and my skip started burning. Anyways I continued with spraying on my wheels. It cleaned about 60% of the staffs after the first spray. But nothing compared to the video.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Bond

customer_reviews.title: As Good As I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for several years and found it to be one of the better consumer use wheel cleaners. Consistantly performs to a satisfactory level but like many others, it struggles on the tough heavy brake dust. Usually takes a double shot for those areas. Again though, very good for a consumer use cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: L. Casciole

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: With some scrubbing, the dirt comes off easy, but uses a lot up per wash.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue and still need to scrub
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on our two vehicles and it left a white colored chalking residue behind. Also it removes perhaps half of the street dust/dirt. If you want it clean nothing beats soap and hand scrubbing. Would have been nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schut

customer_reviews.title: like every other wheel cleaner i have used - the basically don't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have tried at least 5 different wheel cleaners and they all say pretty much the same... spray on, let set, wash off. Unfortunately they all work about the same, which is they remove some of the dirt. You still have to go back and wash the wheels by hand. I don't think the price of any of them is worth the "halfway" results.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Racz

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Used it once for my first car cleaning since I got it, seems to remove brake dust well and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Botterweck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wheel cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product when I wash and detail my car twice so far and it is amazing. Just spray it and let it be (use a brush if you want) and all of the dirty brake dust will come right off. I have my wheels plasti dipped and it did not ruin any part of the dip. I will probably buy this product over and over again. Be sure to wash your wheels before anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew park

customer_reviews.title: The cleaner is good, but the delivery pump is poor
customer_reviews.text: It works, it cleans like it says. The problem is with the deliver system. It foams but does not project well, gets all over your hands and is just difficult to use. I end up having to pump several extra sprays, wasting product and only get 2-3 car washes out of the whole bottle. If the delivery pump was better, it would get a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Residue
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a white residue on rims which is very noticible on any black finished metal. Not really great for my rims.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I could only see dark dirt from my tires, and using this it made them look new!! Loved this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would liked a spray version that spreads across the tire
customer_reviews.text: The delivery is a pump stream. Would liked a spray version that spreads across the tire. Also, as much as three application is required to clean the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product ruined my wheels, although it says it’s “not acidic” it’s clearly not true. Not only did it eat away at my clear coat but now certain areas on and near the wheels have corrosion growing. . This four dollar product is costing me hundreds of dollars in repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Max Vel

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like
customer_reviews.text: Becareful not to let dry as it stained my wheels, but it did a nice job lifting the brake dust
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best tire cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? Spray it on, rinse it off. I can see the white letters on the tires again.
customer_reviews.author: LaVidaLoca

customer_reviews.title: It is a foam
customer_reviews.text: The foam didn't stick to the wheel, fell off in clumps, husband said he didn't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores A Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product With a Weak Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: For all of my life, up until recently, I've used Whestly's Bleech White. But now since they watered down the formula I've switched to this.It's good stuff but I wish Mothers would change the sprayer. I really disperses erratically and it makes you us more product they you need to. That's the only reason it doesn't get five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit Fire

customer_reviews.title: Old grime and brake dust comes off easy. First time used on the factory painted mags ...
customer_reviews.text: Top class product. Old grime and brake dust comes off easy. First time used on the factory painted mags it did required some scrubbing but after that its only shine all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Gacho

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well but the top was loose and a lot of it leaked out onto my other items. I’ll just buy from a local parts house next time.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Brashear

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use it on my leather interior, great product that isnt oily or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Welcel

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Great
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cleaner is great. Spray on and rinse off. Very easy to use and effective. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. If you want to make your tires look new.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D.

customer_reviews.title: i love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff. works great. i just hate the sprayer. it wastes too much product. i transfer it to a regular spray bottle so i can mist it on my wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Super Star -- Great Product -- Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Worked better than the manufacturer's performance claim. Just spray liberally, let the foam do it's job, rinse thoroughly, and step back to admire the shine & cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Wencke

customer_reviews.title: The best wheel/tire cleaner out there!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my AWD wheels which are always full of brake dust, grime, crap, etc. You spray this bad boy on for 30sec and then use a good brush to scrub away for about 30sec. Rinse and voila! Wheels look brand spankin new! I could eat off it if I had to! This isn't spray and rinse folks...you will have to put some effort but believe me, you wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Mini Cooper that has white painted wheels. Black, oily brake dust shows up and spoils the look. I found Mother's Foaming Wheel & Tire Cleaner gently removes the stubborn brake dust without harming the paint. I use a very soft brush to get into the nooks and crannies and this cleaner makes my car look spectacular!!! So glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Coco I.

customer_reviews.title: As good as any other options...
customer_reviews.text: ...in a crowded market of a commodity product. Does a very good job in loosening (if not completely removing) road grime and brake dust before rinsing and washing with a brush or cloth. Wheels: you gotta clean 'em if you're washing your car. This cleaner helps take some of the work of that job.
customer_reviews.author: Long-Suffering Technology Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but pump/handle needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Great product however after my fourth bottle of this product I've concluded that the pump design is a bad one. They need to sell a bottle of the liquid and just let the customer source their own spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Best tire cleaner I've used so far. Black rims and walls looked swank after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for the last 2 years and doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J O Brien

customer_reviews.title: Another strong Mothers product
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn't loosen up all the dirt, but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: NY-Rangers-Fan-1

product_meta.title: Mothers 05924 Foaming Wheel & Tire Cleaner, 24 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:Foaming Wheel & Tire Cleaner, 24 oz.Mothers Wheel & Tire Cleaner is a foaming, non-acidic spray, formulated to quickly and easily clean both wheels and tires, including blackwalls and whitewalls. Safe for painted, clearcoated, color coated, steel, modular, chrome, or factory coated wheels and hubcaps. Its unique spray on, hose off design safely penetrates, dissolves and suspends all types of brake dust, grease, dirt, and grime, making rinsing a snap. Unique spot-free rinse leaves wheels perfectly clean, with no need to hand dry. WARNING: For use on factory/OEM coated wheels and hubcaps only. Avoid polished or roughcast aluminum, billet or anodized wheels. Do not use on motorcycle wheels, casings or components.
feature_bullets: Foaming, non-acidic spray, formulated to quickly and easily clean both wheels and tires, including blackwalls and whitewalls
Safe for painted, clearcoated, color coated, steel, modular, chrome, or factory coated wheels and hubcaps
Unique spray on, hose off design safely penetrates, dissolves and suspends all types of brake dust, grease, dirt, and grime
For use on factory/OEM coated wheels and hubcaps only. Avoid polished or roughcast aluminum, billet or anodized wheels. Do not use on motorcycle wheels, casings or components
